attributes.action: Cars taxed from the day paid, NOT the first day of month
attributes.additional_details:
With the forthcoming tax disc (Vehicle Excise Duty) changes, Taxation should run from the day you tax the vehicle not the start of the month, as you can pay for up to 30 days of tax that you have not been able to use.

Why now everything is computerized using the ANPR cameras SORN etc. and moving away from the hard copy tax disc would we need this antiquated way of running vehicle taxation
